## PlainPacker.pack() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Pack returns packed message to transport envelope

**Signature:**

```typescript
pack(payload: Uint8Array, _params: PlainPackerParams): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | Uint8Array | json message serialized |
|  \_params | [PlainPackerParams](./js-sdk.plainpackerparams.md) | not used here |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

`Promise<Uint8Array>`
